content: Today is a very special day for me. I feel very proud. I just learned that Derek Jeter will be the first Yankee batter to step into the batter's box at the new Yankee Stadium on opening day. I know he is proud too.
reply: Today is a very special day for me. I feel very proud. I just learned that Derek Jeter will be the first Yankee batter to step into the batter's box at the new Yankee Stadium on opening day. I know he is proud too.
title: How proud I am today.

content: I agree with ya on Jeter Kit. He conducts himself on and off the field like Professionals should. Not to mention the help he gives to kids in need.
